1 lb sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch pieces,3 cups broccoli florets,1 red bell pepper,4 green onions, sliced (white and green parts separated),1 tablespoon vegetable oil,cooking spray,1/3 cup soy sauce,3 tablespoons rice vinegar,2 tablespoons honey,1 tablespoon fresh ginger,3 cloves garlic, minced,1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil,1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper,1 teaspoon cornstarch,2 cups cooked white rice,toasted sesame seeds, for garnish,,
